creditline: Gift of the Wilson Centre for Photography
description: bust-length portrait of a young woman with short wavy hair; diagonal lines in background; image "texturized" overall with crosshatch-like lines
inscription:
Signature, date and inscription
ULC on back of mount, in pencil: [Rembrandt/ texture/ B & W.]
signed: LLC on mat below image, in pencil: [Wayne Albee/ 1935]
title: Portrait of a Young Woman
